name: Four Points by Sheraton Bakersfield

reviews.text: I stayed at the Four Points Bakersfield as a last-minute stop. While I thought I knew where the hotel was, it's actually a bit farther off the freeway than the cluster of hotels at the California exit.
reviews.title: Nice Stay at the Four Points
One of the Best in Bakersfield
reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the layout of the property is of a somewhat older style with several buildings , and the second floor is accessed by an exterior staircase. Rooms are outfitted in the standard Four Points style with a complimentary bottle of water, coffeemaker in the room, a flat panel tv, and a desk with plenty of outlets, good lighting, free wireless/wired internet and a nice work space. There is a pool, fitness room, and on-site dining with room service available.

aka: Four Points By Sheraton Bakersfield Hotel Bakersfield
description: Four Points by Sheraton Bakersfield is located in the heart of the business district, with scenic sights and sounds and a short walk to corporate offices. 6,800 square feet of event space.
